original_text: Now when he rose early on the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, from whom he had cast out seven demons.
korean_text: [예수께서 안식 후 첫날 이른 아침에 살아나신 후 전에 일곱 귀신을 쫓아내어 주신 막달라 마리아에게 먼저 보이시니

sentences.original_text: Now when he rose early on the first day of the week
sentences.korean_translation: 안식 후 첫날 이른 아침에 그가 살아나셨을 때

sentences.original_text: he appeared first to Mary Magdalene
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 맨 먼저 막달라 마리아에게 나타나셨습니다

sentences.original_text: from whom he had cast out seven demons
